Title: Interstellar
Description: When Earth becomes uninhibitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.

Genre.Name: Adventure
Genre.Description: An Adventure film typically consists of a setting that  plays an important role in the film. They are typically set in far away lands, such as lost continents or other exotic locations.

Title: Inception
Description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

Genre.Name: Action
Genre.Descritption: An action film is typically characterized by high intensity scenes, sometimes with explosions, dramatic events, or violence.

Description: A young man who is falsely imprisoned by his own friend, finds an unlikely mentor, who aids him in his plan to exact revenge>

Title: The Count of Monte Cristo

Description: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: In film and television, drama is a category or genre of narrative fiction intended to be more serious than humorous in tone.

Title: Braveheart

Description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

Title: Saving Private Ryan

Description: An American military advisor embraces the Samurai culture he was hired to destroy after he is captured in battle.

Title: The Last Samurai

Description: John Beckwith and Jeremy Grey, a pair of committed womanizers who sneak into weddings to take advantage of the romantic tinge in the air, find themselves at odds with one another when John meets and falls for Claire Cleary.

Genre.Name: Comedy
Genre.Description: A comedy is characterized by funny scenarios, jokes, or situations that cause laughter.

Title: Wedding Crashers

Description: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman, George Bailey, by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

Title: It's A Wonderful Life

Description: A poor boy named Arthur learns the power of love, kindness, knowledge and bravery with the help of a wizard called Merlin in the path to become one of the most beloved kings in English history.

Genre.Name: Animation
Genre.Description: An animation film is created using drawings, cartoon animation, and cgi to create a often fictional movie.

Title: The Sword in the Stone

Description: Four teenage mutant ninja turtles Leonardo, Raphael, Donatello, and Michaelangelo fight crime in New York City from the shadows.
